verbs.description: Ahead of the opening of the United States embassy in Jerusalem on Monday , President Donald Trump [V: was] honored and celebrated throughout the historic city . Trump , of course , promised to move the U.S. embassy from Tel Aviv to Jerusalem during his 2016 campaign . He delivered on that promise late last year when he recognized Jerusalem as Israel ’s capital city , which spurred the embassy ’s relocation . What happened ? Plastered on the front of the Jerusalem Post Monday morning was a picture of Trump with the words : “ Promises made . Promises kept . " https://twitter.com/joelpollak/status/995937039869759488 According to Breitbart 's Joel Pollak , who is in Israel covering the opening of the new Jerusalem embassy , a " thank you " message was projected onto the walls of ancient Jerusalem last night . He reported the projection was of a combined American and Israeli flag with the message " Thank you President Trump . " https://twitter.com/joelpollak/status/995738025387876352 Numerous signs were also posted throughout Jerusalem in recent days that declared : " Trump make Israel great . " The signs …
